application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - YEW LOCATED FRONT OF CARPARK, ENCROACHING ON LEFT, TRIM BACK TO BOUNDARY - Trim back by Maximum 0.75m, leaving finished spread of 2.5mT2 - HOLLY ENCROACHING ON RIGHT CORNER, REDUCE BACK FROM CARPARK BY A MAXIMUM OF 1 METRE - Leaving a finished spread of 2mT3 - THUJA ENCROACHING ON RIGHT, REMOVE OVERHANGING LATERAL BRANCHES ALL THE WAY UP TO REDUCE OVERHAND - Reduce overhang (maximum of 2.5m leaving finished spread of 3m) T4 - SYCAMORE LOCATED AT THE OTHER SIDE OF LEFT BOUNDARY OVERHANGING REAR GARDEN, REDUCE LARGE LIMB OVER HANGING GRASS BY A MAXIMUM OF 4 METRES - Leaving a finished length of 5m T5 - DISMANTLE SMALL DEAD TREE LOCATED AT THE RIGHT BOUNDARY. G1 - MIXED SPECIES LOCATED AT THE OTHER SIDE OF RIGHT BOUNDARY GROWING ONTO BUILDING, TRIM BACK AS CLOSE TO BOUNDARY AS POSSIBLE TO CLEAR - Maximum of 2m leaving a finished spread of 3m.TO PROVIDE CLEARANCE
